languages.text: {n}Комиссар издает неприятный смешок.{/n} "Хотя могу понять твое возмущение... овеянная славой {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}знаменитость{/d} пала жертвой столь простой западни! Пожалуй, если бы весть об этом разнеслась столь же далеко, как и истории о твоих ранних свершениях, от доброго имени не осталось бы и следа!"

{n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famed figure{/d} to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар издает неприятный смешок.{/n} "Хотя могу понять твое возмущение... овеянная славой {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}знаменитость{/d} пала жертвой столь простой западни! Пожалуй, если бы весть об этом разнеслась столь же далеко, как и истории о твоих ранних свершениях, от доброго имени не осталось бы и следа!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a famed figure to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this reached as far as the stories about your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

{n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a famed figure to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this reached as far as the stories about your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

{n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a famed figure to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

{n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a famed figure to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

{n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famed figure{/d} to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

languages.text: {n}政委发出了尖酸的大笑。{/n}“你看，我能理解你怎么会这么沮丧……如此{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}大名鼎鼎{/d}的人物，居然会落入如此简单的陷阱！嘿，要是把这件事情加到你的传奇传记里，你的好名声恐怕就要毁于一旦了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famed figure{/d} to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

traits.locale_text: {n}政委发出了尖酸的大笑。{/n}“你看，我能理解你怎么会这么沮丧……如此大名鼎鼎的人物，居然会落入如此简单的陷阱！嘿，要是把这件事情加到你的传奇传记里，你的好名声恐怕就要毁于一旦了！”

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar lacht krächzend.{/n} "Nun, ich kann Euren Frust verstehen ... Dass eine so {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}berühmte Gestalt{/d} in eine solch simple Falle getappt ist! Man stelle sich vor, diese Geschichte verbreitet sich so weit wie die von Euren früheren Erfolgen! Euer guter Ruf wäre ruiniert!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famed figure{/d} to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar lacht krächzend.{/n} "Nun, ich kann Euren Frust verstehen ... Dass eine solch berühmte Gestalt in eine solch simple Falle getappt ist! Man stelle sich vor, diese Geschichte verbreitet sich so weit wie die von Euren früheren Erfolgen! Euer guter Ruf wäre ruiniert!"

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire laisse échapper un rire abrasif.{/n} « Je peux comprendre votre frustration... Quand on pense que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}quelqu'un d'aussi célèbre{/d} que vous est tombé dans un piège aussi grossier ! Si l'histoire de ce petit incident se répand aussi vite que les récits de vos exploits passés, votre réputation sera ruinée en moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famed figure{/d} to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire laisse échapper un rire abrasif.{/n} « Je peux comprendre votre frustration... Quand on pense que quelqu'un d'aussi célèbre que vous est tombé dans un piège aussi grossier ! Si l'histoire de ce petit incident se répand aussi vite que les récits de vos exploits passés, votre réputation sera ruinée en moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire ! »

languages.text: {n}El Comisario suelta una risotada áspera.{/n} «Bueno, entiendo su frustración... ¡Que alguien tan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famos{mf|o|a}{/d} caiga en una trampa tan sencilla! Si esta historia se extendiera tanto como las de sus hazañas anteriores, ¡su nombre quedaría a la altura del barro!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famed figure{/d} to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario suelta una risotada áspera.{/n} «Bueno, entiendo su frustración... ¡Que alguien tan famos{mf|o|a} caiga en una trampa tan sencilla! Si esta historia se extendiera tanto como las de sus hazañas anteriores, ¡su nombre quedaría a la altura del barro!».

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは険悪な笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「焦る気持ちは分かるよ…あれほど{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}有名な人物{/d}が、こんな単純な罠にはまるとはな！この噂がお前の過去の功績の話にまで広まったら、名誉は台無しになってしまうだろう！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famed figure{/d} to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは険悪な笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「焦る気持ちは分かるよ…あれほど{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}有名な人物{/d}が、こんな単純な罠にはまるとはな！この噂がお前の過去の功績の話にまで広まったら、名誉は台無しになってしまうだろう！」

languages.text: {n}Komiser, rahatsız edici bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Öfkeli olmanı anlayabiliyorum. Böylesi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}ünlü bir şansın{/d} bu kadar basit bir tuzağa düşmesi... Burada olanlar, insanların geçmiş başarılarını konuştukları yerlerde dillendirilirse o güzel ismine büyük leke sürülür!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out an abrasive laugh.{/n} "Well, I can understand your frustration... For such a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}famed figure{/d} to have fallen for such a simple trap! Why, if word of this travelled as far as the tales of your former accomplishments, your good name would be ruined!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser rahatsız edici bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Eh, öfkeli olmanı anlayabiliyorum. Böylesi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}ünlü bir şansın{/d} böyle basit bir tuzağa düşmesi... Bu yaşananlar, insanların geçmiş başarılarını konuştukları yerlere kadar uzanırsa, o güzel ismine büyük leke sürülür!"
